caption.p: The effect of compounds II and V on caspase-5, -6 and -8 activation in normal and tumour cells. Normal cell line: Vero – (ECACC 88020401) – African Green Monkey kidney cells. Cancer cell lines: A549 (ECACC 86012804) – human Caucasian lung carcinoma cells; HeLa (ECACC 93021013) – human Negroid cervix epitheloid carcinoma cells; T-47D (ECACC 85102201) – human breast carcinoma cells. Data represent the mean ± SD of three independent experiments. *Statistically significantly different from the control ( p < 0.05, t-Student’s test).
